result.purpose: Provides functions to convert between strings and byte slices without memory allocation.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to byte and string conversions in a dedicated module with accompanying tests.

internal/bytesconv/bytesconv.go.purpose: Provides functions to convert between strings and byte slices without memory allocation.
risks: unsafe memory operations may lead to vulnerabilities if not handled properly

internal/bytesconv/bytesconv_test.go.purpose: This file contains tests and benchmarks for converting between bytes and strings.
side_effects: Uses time for random seed generation
risks: Potential for non-deterministic behavior in tests due to randomness
